results.content: Really great!  Clear explanations delivered at a pace I can follow.  I especially like the extensive use of Elementor to modify the pages that come with the theme used in the course.  I feel confident that I can use this or other themes and change them to suit my needs instead of trying to find the perfect theme.  Thanks, KC!

response.content: You are welcome, Doug! Do let me know if you need any help along the way!

results.content: Excellent course, but I would have liked for this course to concentrate more on using the Gutenberg editors and how to use each of the blocks since that is the primary reason I watched this course.  I want to get really good at using the Gutenberg editor to create websites that are similar to the ones that I see have been created with page builders.  I want to be able to do websites without using page builders and to only use the Gutenberg editor to do the websites.

response.content: Thank you for your suggestion, Russell! I will consider your suggestion.

results.content: The template he uses for course are not available or are free. Drove me nuts searching for "Zackra". Be careful when purchasing courses that use an outdated WordPress interface or version.

response.content: Hi BIlly, the theme that I use in this course is 'Zakra', not 'Zackra'. Hope this clarifies. Do let me know if you have any questions along the way.

results.content: If you are looking for a good, concise intro course into WordPress than you cannot do better than KC. I manage a WP site and am an intermediate user, but I am learning a lot from his very direct teaching. The very best part is he does and INCREDIBLE job in responding to students, answering questions and helping clear up issues. Cannot recommend enough!!
